name: 01-Project-Overview
content:
Project Overview

Objective

The objective of this project is to build a product recommendation system leveraging customer invoice history and product hierarchy data. The primary business problem addressed is improving cross-sell and upsell opportunities by suggesting relevant products to customers based on their historical purchases, product affinities, and parent-child product groupings. This helps in personalizing customer engagement and boosting sales conversion.

Approach

The project follows a structured data science workflow:

  1. Data Ingestion – Load and merge the customer invoice data with parent-product mapping.
  2. Data Preparation – Cleanse data, handle missing values, ensure correct data types, and create customer-product interaction matrices.
  3. Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) – Profile customer purchase patterns, product frequency, and revenue contribution.
  4. Feature Engineering – Derive features such as purchase frequency, recency, monetary value (RFM), and product affinities.
  5. Model Training – Apply collaborative filtering and content-based models to generate product recommendations.
  6. Evaluation – Assess model accuracy using ranking metrics (e.g., precision@k, recall@k).
  7. Deployment – Expose recommendations through an API or integrate them into a web application for end-users.

Significance

Personalized product recommendations are crucial for customer retention, revenue maximization, and inventory optimization. By leveraging past customer behavior and product relationships, the business can provide data-driven suggestions, improving the overall shopping experience.

Benefits

  • Revenue Growth: Increased sales via targeted recommendations.
  • Customer Retention: Improved satisfaction through personalization.
  • Operational Efficiency: Better product targeting reduces marketing spend waste.
  • Strategic Advantage: Stronger customer insights enabling loyalty-building initiatives.

Expected Outcomes

  • A working recommendation engine that suggests products to customers.
  • Improved cross-sell/upsell conversion rates.
  • Data-driven customer segmentation insights.
  • Measurable improvement in engagement metrics (CTR, purchase frequency).
